actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: Joint resolution to authorize and request the President to issue annually a proclamation designating the second Sunday of October of each year as "National Older Americans' Day".

summary.text: Authorizes the President to issue annually a proclamation designating the second Sunday of October of each year as "National Older Americans' Day".

titles.title: Joint resolution to authorize and request the President to issue annually a proclamation designating the second Sunday of October of each year as "National Older Americans' Day".
